ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) package STOVE TOP Stuffing Mix for Chicken
instructions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F. Cook pork in large skillet until cooked through, stirring frequently; drain.
Place in large bowl; cool slightly.
Add cranberry sauce, egg and water;
Shape into 16 balls; place on foil-covered baking sheet.
title: Stuffing Balls

normalized_ingredients.I2CnalDeN: STOVE TOP Stuffing Mix for Chicken

steps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F. Cook pork in large skillet until cooked through, stirring frequently; drain. Place in large bowl; cool slightly. Stir in dry stuffing mix.
Add cranberry sauce, egg and water; mix well. Shape into 16 balls; place on foil-covered baking sheet. Brush evenly with butter.
